features: Upgrade Your Clothing Care Game: Experience powerful steam output at 20 g/min for quick and efficient garment steaming and refreshing. Glide effortlessly in a single motion for a flawless look.

Switch it up with our Dual-Sided Pad: Our innovative reversible pad system lets you seamlessly transition between lint removal and the gentle velvet side, ensuring perfect steaming on any fabric type.
Travel-Ready & Stylish: With an ultra-compact, sleek, and lightweight design, this garment steamer is your go-to travel companion for maintaining your style on the go

15-Second Heat-Up for the Busy Lifestyle: This garment steamer is always at hand, ready to go in just 15 seconds – perfect for frequent use or those last-minute touch-ups that'll save you precious time.

Natural Sanitizing Power: Freshen up your wardrobe with the purifying power of steam, effectively reducing odors and refreshing your clothes without harsh chemicals. Stay fresh, eco-friendly, and effortlessly stylish.
body.description: Reveal your style with the Pure POP Handheld Garment Steamer. The garment care solution that takes fabric care to a new level. This steamer is intuitive, fast and efficient, purifying and steaming in one simple, smooth movement. The unique reversible pad system switches effortlessly between a velvet side for steaming without any risk of damage—even to the most delicate textiles—and a lint remover side that refreshes clothes and keeps you looking your best.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent efficient and easy to use steamer!
reviews.reviewText: I had never used a steamer before and was just a bit hesitant to try it, but I purchased some items that could not be ironed and arrived extremely wrinkled, so this was the obvious and perfect solution for me! The instructions are very straight forward and clear. It is easy to use safely, and I found it to be totally effective. Depending on how badly wrinkled your items are, you may end up having to fill the water reservoir multiple times, but that, too, is quick and easy. I absolutely recommend it! (And I LOVE my yellow one! Fantastic and cheerful color.) Oh, it was also easy to register the warranty.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I am so incredibly impressed by this little machine. The thick hem on the 100% cotton (lavender denim) mini skirt that I own always is flipped one way or another via a huge wrinkle, but I was able to smooth it out with this! I really believe that was the ultimate test (for what I need the steamer for) because I was convinced only an iron would take out that giant wrinkle. Nope! Had to go over it several times to get it out, but it didn't take too long and it was super satisfying to see it all flatten out. In the past, I've been a chronic wrinkly-clothes person, not thinking TOO too much of it (a lot of my clothes are stuffed in drawers, albeit folded), but feeling insecure at times when things seemed to be a little *too* wrinkly. As I'm now in my 30s, I all of the sudden find it very important. I think it's quite classy to have nicely pressed/steamed clothes, and I feel more comfortable and fashionable now that I own this and it's even cooler that it takes up very little room and I can bring it with me (to the office, or away at a conference for work, for example), if need be! I take a lot of pride in my how I choose to dress myself and have noticed that wrinkly and creased clothes make me feel off, so this has been the cherry on top to make each outfit look more put together. :) Highly recommend this very easy to use product. I have caught myself with the steam a couple of times, but that's user error. I would not recommend (AT ALL) putting this directly anywhere near your face, but if you happen to catch some steam from afar, it's almost like you're also getting a little face treatment in addition to the clothes steaming!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I like that it heats up quickly, the cord is long enough to reach from the other to where I can hang the garment, it's easy to use, & it's attractive, small, & portable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good for an occasional steam
reviews.reviewText: Works well but the water tank is very small. I had to refill it a lot just to complete one garment

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great ironing alternitive and time saver
reviews.reviewText: This is a great alternative to an ironing board and iron. You can't get out deep wrinkles, but if you just need to get out little wrinkles, it is great. Heats right up and is great for last-minute touch-ups. Great price and great quality!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My go to
reviews.reviewText: I have a bigger one, and this one. This one is now my go to. Just easier to use on the fly when needed. Heats up fast. Works well. Happy I bought it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Portable, lightweight, easy to use, does a GREAT job.
reviews.reviewText: We have been dealing with having wrinkly clothes for a bit living on the road and hadn't gotten any sort of iron to resolve it. We decided with this handheld steamer because it's smaller and lightweight but also is steaming and de-linting when needed. This has been such a game changer for us. We love it. It's so easy to use and then it stores easily, too. Absolutely love this and wish we'd gotten it sooner.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I had to take a break from steaming everything I own to write a quick review. This steamer is cute, so easy to use, and takes out wrinkles in seconds! I’m steaming everything- jeans, t-shirts, pajamas… I didn’t think I’d have this much fun. It’s definitely worth the $35-40, so if you’re like me and have to read reviews for 75 different options before making a decision- I’ll save you the time. This one is good!

I’ve never really learned how to iron and when online clothing comes it always has SO MANY wrinkles and they look so bad; this is the solution!! I LOVE THIS THING!! It works perfectly, is easy to use and my clothes look awesome!!The only small negative is that the water canister could be bigger, I steamed 4 shirts and a blazer and had to refill it 3 times, but that’s not a big deal at all, as it’s smaller size will make it great for travelling. If you want a steamer, but this one!
Me sirve mucho tanto para la casa como para salir de viaje, con un refill me alcanza pra una prenda

I travel for work and let me tell you this can do a full suit; jacket, pants and dress shirt with one tank of water flawlessly. I am obsessed with this thing. Looks great and works great. Gets the wrinkles out seamlessly. Highly recommend for travel and even at home use. Water reservoir is only limitation if you need to do a lot of clothes, but it's so quick to pop it off and fill it up it almost isn't a limitation.

reviews.reviewTitle: Big Size for travel but effcient, very small water reservoir
reviews.reviewText: Re-boxed item well working but came with a few tiny scratches. Didn't really look new. Works very well, does a great job, but what is frustrating is how small the water reservoir is. You steam one shirt and half a trouser and it's empty. Size is big, and when you consider its size, including handle, it makes a big chunky item in your suitcase. Some other products (Philips?) have a foldable handle and a bigger reservoir. That would be my other choice, but all in all, a good product that works well.
